title: NFL ATL: Midseason Hero Awards, TNF preview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Midseason Hero Awards, TNF preview
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling join producer K. Rich behind the glass to bring you the first annual “Midseason Hero Awards.” Find out who wins all best of, worst of and quirky awards categories. The crew also previews NFL Network’s “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the Cincinnati Bengals and Miami Dolphins. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
